A

AbstractConfig - Class in adudecalledleo.lionutils.config
Base class for POJOs which don't require a Config.verify() implementation.
AbstractConfig() - Constructor for class adudecalledleo.lionutils.config.AbstractConfig
 
addAndRemove(List<T>, List<T>, List<T>) - Static method in class adudecalledleo.lionutils.ListUtil
Updates a list using an "elements to add" list and an "elements to remove" list.
Useful for implementing listener/observer patterns.
addHideFlags(ItemStack, ItemStack.TooltipSection...) - Static method in class adudecalledleo.lionutils.item.ItemStackUtil
Adds to an ItemStack's hide flags.
addListener(BiConsumer<ConfigHolder.Event, T>) - Method in class adudecalledleo.lionutils.config.ConfigHolder
Adds a listener that will be called when the config is loaded or saved.
address() - Method in interface adudecalledleo.lionutils.unsafe.HeapMemory
Gets the memory block's address on the heap.
addressSize() - Method in interface adudecalledleo.lionutils.unsafe.UnsafeAccess
Gets the current address size in bytes.
adudecalledleo.lionutils - package adudecalledleo.lionutils
Contains various general and miscellaneous utility classes.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.block - package adudecalledleo.lionutils.block
Contains subclasses of Block that should either be subclassed themselves or, if not abstract, constructed directly.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.block.entity.listener - package adudecalledleo.lionutils.block.entity.listener
Contains listeners for use with BaseBlockWithEntity.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.client.color - package adudecalledleo.lionutils.client.color
Contain classes to deal with colors.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.client.render - package adudecalledleo.lionutils.client.render
Contains classes to deal with rendering.
WARNING: All classes in this package and its sub-packages should only be called in a client environment! Calling them in a dedicated server environment will invariably lead to a crash!!!
adudecalledleo.lionutils.config - package adudecalledleo.lionutils.config
Contains classes to deal with loading and saving configurations.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.entity - package adudecalledleo.lionutils.entity
Contains classes to deal with the mess that Mojang calls this game's entity system.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.inventory - package adudecalledleo.lionutils.inventory
Contains utility classes for handling Inventorys.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.item - package adudecalledleo.lionutils.item
Contains utility classes for handling Items and ItemStackss.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.mixin - package adudecalledleo.lionutils.mixin
Contains Mixins used by this library.
Mixins in this package can be safely used by mods that depend on this library.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.network - package adudecalledleo.lionutils.network
Contains classes used for network operations.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.serialize - package adudecalledleo.lionutils.serialize
Contains classes used for serialization and deserialization of objects.
adudecalledleo.lionutils.unsafe - package adudecalledleo.lionutils.unsafe
 
afterBreak(World, PlayerEntity, BlockPos, BlockState, BlockEntity, ItemStack) - Method in class adudecalledleo.lionutils.block.BaseBlockWithEntity
 
allocate(long) - Method in interface adudecalledleo.lionutils.unsafe.UnsafeAccess
Allocates a block of memory on the heap.
appendLore(ItemStack, Text...) - Static method in class adudecalledleo.lionutils.item.ItemStackUtil
Appends lines of lore to an ItemStack.
appendLore(ItemStack, List<Text>) - Static method in class adudecalledleo.lionutils.item.ItemStackUtil
Appends lines of lore to an ItemStack.
appendProperties(StateManager.Builder<Block, BlockState>) - Method in class adudecalledleo.lionutils.block.ProperFacingBlock

AQUA - Static variable in class adudecalledleo.lionutils.client.color.ColorConstants
 
arrayBaseOffset(Class<?>) - Method in interface adudecalledleo.lionutils.unsafe.UnsafeAccess
Gets the base offset of an array class, AKA the offset to the first element.
arrayIndexScale(Class<?>) - Method in interface adudecalledleo.lionutils.unsafe.UnsafeAccess
Gets the index scale of an array class, AKA the amount of bytes between each element.
